Question & Options:
In the movie 'The Big Wedding' (2013), which director and producer appeared on a Season 6 episode of TLC's Cake Boss to order the wedding cake for the film?
Options:
A. A) Justin Zackham and Clay Pecorin
B. B) Clay Pecorin and Buddy Valastro
C. C) Justin Zackham and Buddy Valastro
D. D) Clay Pecorin and Justin Zackham
Correct Answer: A) Justin Zackham and Clay Pecorin
